name: SpellingBee
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spelling bee
des:
Say a word, and Alexa will tell you if you are spelling it correctly. She will also spell it for you.

User> Alexa, open Spelling Bee
Alexa> Go ahead and say a word
User> quip
Alexa> Got it! Go ahead and spell it
User> q-u-e-e-p
Alexa> The correct spelling is q-u-i-p
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
